Context:
The text mentions the expansion of the School of Design at George Brown College and provides information on donations and fundraising for the college. Here is the extracted information:

- Capital Campaign for the expansion of the School of Design at George Brown College
- Online donation option available
- Endowed funds invest in programs of your choice and provide financial support for the college
- Help ensure students are not denied a George Brown education due to financial burden
- Tax receipt provided for publicly traded shares donated, without tax on gain
- Attend events to help meet fundraising goals
- Legacy gifts allow you to make a charitable gift that can be realized later or through your estate
- Option to convert miles into funds
- Sign up for college news and updates, including application deadlines, upcoming events, tours, etc.
- Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- Social media hub available
- Information on land acknowledgment can be learned about
- Disclaimer that website information is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation, offer or warranty
- Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
